entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
